body.p:
J R
Office German Insurance Company.
Louisville, Ky., March 4th 1862
To His Excellency
Beriah Magoffin
Frankfort
Dear Sir.
I herewith take the liberty to make application for the office of Notary Public.
as I am ellected Secy of the German Insurance company of this city, I find it necessary to hold such office.

I remain Respectfully
Your Servant
Chas C Bohne Secy

I respectfully ask for Mr Bohne the
appointment -- above indicated
